verses.verse: When thou goest <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H4421>battle<s%> against thine <S%H341>enemies<s%>, and <S%H7200>seest<s%> <S%H5483>horses<s%>, and <S%H7393>chariots<s%>, and a <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7227>more<s%> than thou, be not <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of them: for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> is with thee, which brought thee <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.
And it shall be, when ye are come <S%H7126>nigh<s%> unto the <S%H4421>battle<s%>, that the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5066>approach<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%>,

And shall <S%H559>say<s%> unto them, <S%H8085>Hear<s%>, O <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, ye <S%H7131>approach<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> unto <S%H4421>battle<s%> against your <S%H341>enemies<s%>: let not your <S%H3824>hearts<s%> <S%H7401>faint<s%>, <S%H3372>fear<s%> not, and do not <S%H2648>tremble<s%>, neither be ye <S%H6206>terrified<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of them;
For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is he that <S%H1980>goeth<s%> with you, to <S%H3898>fight<s%> for you against your <S%H341>enemies<s%>, to <S%H3467>save<s%> you.

¶ And the <S%H7860>officers<s%> shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, What <S%H376>man<s%> is there that hath <S%H1129>built<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>, and hath not <S%H2596>dedicated<s%> it? let him <S%H3212>go<s%> and <S%H7725>return<s%> to his <S%H1004>house<s%>, lest he <S%H4191>die<s%> in the <S%H4421>battle<s%>, and <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2596>dedicate<s%> it.

And what <S%H376>man<s%> is he that hath <S%H5193>planted<s%> a <S%H3754>vineyard<s%>, and hath not yet <S%H2490>eaten<s%> of it? let him also <S%H3212>go<s%> and <S%H7725>return<s%> unto his <S%H1004>house<s%>, lest he <S%H4191>die<s%> in the <S%H4421>battle<s%>, and <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2490>eat<s%> of it.

And what <S%H376>man<s%> is there that hath <S%H781>betrothed<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%>, and hath not <S%H3947>taken<s%> her? let him <S%H3212>go<s%> and <S%H7725>return<s%> unto his <S%H1004>house<s%>, lest he <S%H4191>die<s%> in the <S%H4421>battle<s%>, and <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> her.

And the <S%H7860>officers<s%> shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H3254>further<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and they shall <S%H559>say<s%>, What <S%H376>man<s%> is there that is <S%H3373>fearful<s%> and <S%H7390%H3824>fainthearted<s%>? let him <S%H3212>go<s%> and <S%H7725>return<s%> unto his <S%H1004>house<s%>, lest his <S%H251>brethren's<s%> <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H4549>faint<s%> as well as his <S%H3824>heart<s%>.

And it shall be, when the <S%H7860>officers<s%> have made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H1696>speaking<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%>, that they shall <S%H6485>make<s%> <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H6635>armies<s%> to <S%H7218>lead<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>.
¶ When thou comest <S%H7126>nigh<s%> unto a <S%H5892>city<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> against it, then <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> unto it.

And it shall be, if it make thee <S%H6030>answer<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%>, and <S%H6605>open<s%> unto thee, then it shall be, that all the <S%H5971>people<s%> that is <S%H4672>found<s%> therein shall be <S%H4522>tributaries<s%> unto thee, and they shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> thee.
And if it will make no <S%H7999>peace<s%> with thee, but will <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%> against thee, then thou shalt <S%H6696>besiege<s%> it:

And when the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H5414>delivered<s%> it into thine <S%H3027>hands<s%>, thou shalt <S%H5221>smite<s%> every <S%H2138>male<s%> thereof with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%>:

But the <S%H802>women<s%>, and the little <S%H2945>ones<s%>, and the <S%H929>cattle<s%>, and all that is in the <S%H5892>city<s%>, even all the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> thereof, shalt thou <S%H962>take<s%> unto thyself; and thou shalt <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> of thine <S%H341>enemies<s%>, which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H5414>given<s%> thee.

Thus shalt thou <S%H6213>do<s%> unto all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> which are <S%H3966>very<s%> far <S%H7350>off<s%> from thee, <S%H2007>which<s%> are not of the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of these <S%H1471>nations<s%>.

But of the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of these <S%H5971>people<s%>, which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> doth <S%H5414>give<s%> thee for an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, thou shalt save <S%H2421>alive<s%> nothing that <S%H5397>breatheth<s%>:

But thou shalt <S%H2763>utterly<s%> <S%H2763>destroy<s%> them; namely, the <S%H2850>Hittites<s%>, and the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%>, and the <S%H6522>Perizzites<s%>, the <S%H2340>Hivites<s%>, and the <S%H2983>Jebusites<s%>; as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H6680>commanded<s%> thee:

That they <S%H3925>teach<s%> you not to <S%H6213>do<s%> after all their <S%H8441>abominations<s%>, which they have <S%H6213>done<s%> unto their <S%H430>gods<s%>; so should ye <S%H2398>sin<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>.

¶ When thou shalt <S%H6696>besiege<s%> a <S%H5892>city<s%> a <S%H7227>long<s%> <S%H3117>time<s%>, in making <S%H3898>war<s%> against it to <S%H8610>take<s%> it, thou shalt not <S%H7843>destroy<s%> the <S%H6086>trees<s%> thereof by <S%H5080>forcing<s%> an <S%H1631>axe<s%> against them: for thou mayest <S%H398>eat<s%> of them, and thou shalt not cut them <S%H3772>down<s%> (for the <S%H6086>tree<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> is <S%H120>man's<s%> life) to <S%H935>employ<s%> them in the <S%H6440%H4692>siege<s%>:

Only the <S%H6086>trees<s%> which thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%> that they be not <S%H6086>trees<s%> for <S%H3978>meat<s%>, thou shalt <S%H7843>destroy<s%> and cut them <S%H3772>down<s%>; and thou shalt <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H4692>bulwarks<s%> against the <S%H5892>city<s%> that <S%H6213>maketh<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%> with thee, until it be <S%H3381>subdued<s%>.
